entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is watching the dark figures from afar.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who would be embarrassed if his friends saw Harry sitting alone.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about what Dudley would do if he saw him sitting alone, and how it would affect their relationship.
Harry is watching the dark figures from afar, trying to decide whether to confront them or not.
